class.name: TwitchGamesRequests
class.brief_description: Twitch Games API for game information and top games.
class.description: TwitchGamesRequests provides methods for retrieving game information and discovering top games by viewer count. No special OAuth scopes required. Access through [method TwitchAPI.get_games].

method.name: get_games
method.description: Gets information about specified games. [param params] must include id, name, or igdb_id. Results are returned via the [signal TwitchAPI.request_completed] signal with signal_name "games_received". [b]Response includes:[/b] Array of games with id, name, box_art_url (template with {width}x{height}), igdb_id. [codeblock] var params = {"name": ["Just Chatting", "Minecraft"]} TwitchAPI.get_games().get_games(params) # Response: {"data": [{"id": "509658", "name": "Just Chatting", "box_art_url": "https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/ttv-boxart/509658-{width}x{height}.jpg", "igdb_id": ""}]} [/codeblock]

method.name: get_top_games
method.description: Gets games sorted by number of current viewers on Twitch. Optional [param params] can include first, before, and after for pagination. Results are returned via the [signal TwitchAPI.request_completed] signal with signal_name "top_games_received". [b]Response includes:[/b] Array of games with id, name, box_art_url, igdb_id. [codeblock] TwitchAPI.get_games().get_top_games({"first": 10}) # Response: {"data": [{"id": "509658", "name": "Just Chatting", "box_art_url": "https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/ttv-boxart/509658-{width}x{height}.jpg"}]} [/codeblock]
